I cannot reproduce today. I got the problem yesterday. Reducing severity to normal.

The node that the working copy was created on, was removed by another client.
Perhaps something in the background? Tod, I can help you look at this if it
comes up again.
Marking as REMIND as the problem has not been recreated in 2 years. Please reopen if you see it
